trans-unit.source: Contains a reference to a conceptual model and a data source connection.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma referência a um modelo conceptual e uma ligação à origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, EntityConnection must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar inadvertidamente colocar objetos, tais como <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>sincronizados com os seus metadados, a EntityConnection tem de bloquear os seus metadados.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação são permitidas depois dos metadados está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The EntityConnection instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se dois cenários em que está bloqueado metadados:-a EntityConnection instância é construída através do construtor predefinido ou através de <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>construtor, que aceita uma cadeia de ligação.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: Em ambos os casos a cadeia de ligação poderá ter sido alterada várias vezes antes da ligação está aberta.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>bloqueia os metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The EntityConnection instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: -A instância a EntityConnection é construída através de do <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>construtor, que aceita um <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, os metadados está bloqueado durante a construção.

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação nunca são permitidas.

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the EntityConnection verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: Quando os metadados estiver carregado, a EntityConnection verifica o modelo conceptual, o modelo de armazenamento e que o ficheiro de mapeamento estão presentes todos os.

trans-unit.source: For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos de código, consulte [trabalhar com EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar inadvertidamente colocar objetos, tais como <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>sincronizados com os seus metadados <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>tem de bloquear os seus metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação são permitidas depois dos metadados está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se dois cenários em que está bloqueado metadados: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através do construtor predefinido ou através de <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>construtor, que aceita uma cadeia de ligação.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: Em ambos os casos a cadeia de ligação poderá ter sido alterada várias vezes antes da ligação está aberta.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>bloqueia os metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através de do <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>construtor, que aceita um <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, os metadados está bloqueado durante a construção.

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação nunca são permitidas.

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: Quando os metadados estiver carregado, o <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>verifica se o modelo conceptual, o modelo de armazenamento e o ficheiro de mapeamento estão todos presentes.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos de código, consulte [trabalhar com EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> class, based on the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> classe, com base na cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The generate a named connection string that is stored in the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Gerar uma cadeia de ligação com nome que é armazenada no ficheiro de configuração da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: This named connection string can be supplied in place of the `connectionString` parameter when you instantiate the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta cadeia de ligação com nome pode ser fornecida em vez do `connectionString` parâmetro quando instanciar a <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>classe.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar colocar inadvertidamente objetos <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>sincronizados com os seus metadados <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>tem de bloquear os seus metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação são permitidas depois dos metadados está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through this constructor (EntityConnection), which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se dois cenários em que está bloqueado metadados: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através o construtor predefinido ou através deste construtor (a EntityConnection), que aceita uma cadeia de ligação.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: Em ambos os casos a cadeia de ligação poderá ter sido alterada várias vezes antes da ligação está aberta.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>bloqueia os metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através de do <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>construtor, que aceita um <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, os metadados está bloqueado durante a construção.

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação nunca são permitidas.

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: Quando os metadados estiver carregado, o <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>verifica se o modelo conceptual, o modelo de armazenamento e o ficheiro de mapeamento estão todos presentes.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos de código, consulte [trabalhar com EntityClient](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

trans-unit.source: The provider-specific connection string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ligação específica do fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: An invalid connection string keyword has been provided, or a required connection string keyword has not been provided.
trans-unit.target: Uma palavra-chave da cadeia de ligação inválido foi fornecido ou uma palavra-chave da cadeia de ligação necessárias não foi fornecida.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> class with a specified <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> and <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> classe com uma determinada <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This constructor enables you to create an <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> from metadata that is not from a file on a disk or from an embedded resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor permite-lhe criar um <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>de metadados que é um ficheiro num disco ou a um recurso incorporado numa assemblagem.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar inadvertidamente colocar objetos, tais como <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>sincronizados com os seus metadados do <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>tem de bloquear os seus metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação são permitidas depois dos metadados está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se dois cenários em que está bloqueado metadados: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através do construtor predefinido ou através de <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>construtor, que aceita uma cadeia de ligação.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: Em ambos os casos a cadeia de ligação poderá ter sido alterada várias vezes antes da ligação está aberta.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>bloqueia os metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through this constructor (EntityConnection), which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através deste construtor (a EntityConnection), que aceita um <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, os metadados está bloqueado durante a construção.

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação nunca são permitidas.

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: Quando os metadados estiver carregado, o <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>verifica se o modelo conceptual, o modelo de armazenamento e o ficheiro de mapeamento estão todos presentes.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> to be associated with this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"> </xref> estar associado este <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The underlying data source connection for this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ligação para esta origem de dados subjacentes <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The workspace or connection parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The workspace or connection parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The conceptual model is missing from the workspace.
trans-unit.target: O modelo concetual está em falta a partir da área de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: -or- The mapping file is missing from the workspace.
trans-unit.target: - ou - ficheiro de mapeamento está em falta na área de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: -or- The storage model is missing from the workspace.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o modelo de armazenamento se encontra em falta a área de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connection is not in a closed state.
trans-unit.target: - ou - connection não se encontra no estado fechado.

trans-unit.source: The connection is not from an ADO.NET Entity Framework-compatible provider.
trans-unit.target: O connection não é de um fornecedor ADO.NET Entity Framework compatível.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction by using the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma transação utilizando o fornecedor subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The BeginTransaction method uses the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> transaction isolation level.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginTransaction utiliza o <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel>nível de isolamento da transação.</xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To specify a different isolation level, call <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um nível de isolamento diferentes, chame <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value might be interpreted differently by different underlying providers.
trans-unit.target: Este valor pode ser interpretado diferente pelos fornecedores subjacentes diferentes.

trans-unit.source: If you want your application to be portable across multiple providers, it should explicitly specify the transaction isolation level by calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender que a aplicação ser portáteis através de vários fornecedores,-explicitamente deve especificar o nível de isolamento da transação chamando <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: At any particular moment there can be no more than one active transaction that was created through BeginTransaction.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer momento de determinado não podem existir mais do que uma transação ativa que foi criada através da BeginTransaction.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call any of the BeginTransaction overloads on an <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> that already has a current transaction results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Uma tentativa de chamar qualquer uma das sobrecargas BeginTransaction uma <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>que já tem um resultados de transação atual no <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref> instance can later be associated with the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> to execute the command under that transaction.
trans-unit.target: O devolvido <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"> </xref> instância mais tarde pode ser associada a <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"> </xref> ao executar o comando em que transação.

trans-unit.source: The underlying provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor subjacente não é conhecido.

trans-unit.source: -or- The call to BeginTransaction was made on an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> that already has a current transaction.
trans-unit.target: - ou - foi efetuada a chamada para BeginTransaction num <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> que já tem uma transação atual.

trans-unit.source: -or- The state of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o estado do <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> não é <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction with the specified isolation level by using the underlying provider.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma transação com o nível de isolamento especificado utilizando o fornecedor subjacente.

trans-unit.source: At any particular moment there can be no more than one active transaction that was created through <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer momento de determinado pode existir mais do que uma transação ativa que foi criada através da <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call any of the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> overloads on an <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> that already has a current transaction results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Uma tentativa de chamar qualquer uma das <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>sobrecargas uma <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>que já tem um resultados de transação atual no <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The isolation level of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: O nível de isolamento da transação.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"></xref> instance can later be associated with the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> to execute the command under that transaction.
trans-unit.target: O devolvido <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityTransaction"> </xref> instância mais tarde pode ser associada a <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"> </xref> ao executar o comando em que transação.

trans-unit.source: The underlying provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor subjacente não é conhecido.

trans-unit.source: -or- The call to <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction*> was made on an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> that already has a current transaction.
trans-unit.target: - ou - a chamada para <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction*>foi efetuada num <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> que já tem uma transação atual.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.BeginTransaction*>

trans-unit.source: -or- The state of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o estado do <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> não é <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.source: The ChangeDatabase method is required when deriving from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: O método ChangeDatabase é necessário quando efetuar a derivação de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported and will raise a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não é suportado e irá elevar <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não suportada.

trans-unit.source: When the method is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando o método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: Fecha a ligação à base de dados.

trans-unit.source: If the underlying data provider is not known, the call to Close does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Se o fornecedor de dados subjacente não é conhecido, a chamada de Close não produz qualquer efeito.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when closing the connection.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao fechar a ligação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> connection string.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> cadeia de ligação.

trans-unit.source: The connection string required to establish the initial connection to a data source.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ligação necessária para estabelecer a ligação inicial para uma origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: On a closed connection, the currently set value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Numa ligação fechada, atualmente definida valor é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: If no value has been set, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: Não se tiver sido definido nenhum valor, é devolvida uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the ConnectionString property after the [EntityConnection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)’s <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> was initialized.
trans-unit.target: Foi efetuada uma tentativa para definir a propriedade ConnectionString após o [a EntityConnection](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)do <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"> </xref> foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The [MetadataWorkspace](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) is initialized either when the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"></xref> instance is constructed through the overload that takes a <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"></xref> as a parameter, or when the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> instance has been opened.
trans-unit.target: O [MetadataWorkspace](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) é inicializado ou quando o <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"> </xref> instância é construída através a sobrecarga que recebe um <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"> </xref> como um parâmetro, ou quando o <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> instância foi aberta.

trans-unit.source: An invalid connection string keyword has been provided or a required connection string keyword has not been provided.
trans-unit.target: Uma palavra-chave da cadeia de ligação inválido foi fornecido ou uma palavra-chave da cadeia de ligação necessárias não foi fornecida.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of seconds to wait when attempting to establish a connection before ending the attempt and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de segundos de espera ao tentar estabelecer uma ligação antes de terminar a tentativa e de gerar um erro.

trans-unit.source: Returns zero if the underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: Devolve zero se o fornecedor de dados subjacente não é conhecido.

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: O tempo (em segundos) de espera por uma ligação abrir.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the underlying data provider's default time-out.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é o tempo limite predefinido do fornecedor de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor definido é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of an <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref>, with the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand.Connection*> set to this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"> </xref>, com o <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand.Connection*>definido para este <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand.Connection*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The name of the underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: O nome do fornecedor de dados subjacente não é conhecido.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current database, or the database that will be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da base de dados atual ou a base de dados que será utilizado após uma ligação está aberta.

trans-unit.source: For the specific keyword value, such as `Database`, that maps to the Database property, see the documentation for the underlying data provider.
trans-unit.target: Para o valor de palavra-chave específica, tal como `Database`, que mapeia para a propriedade de base de dados, consulte a documentação para o fornecedor de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] equivalent keywords, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] equivalentes palavras-chave, consulte a documentação para o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Database" name="Database" href=""></xref> property of the underlying data provider.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref uid="langword_csharp_Database" name="Database" href=""> </xref> propriedade do fornecedor de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de dados subjacente não é conhecido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name or network address of the data source to connect to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome ou endereço de rede da origem de dados para ligar a.

trans-unit.source: For the specific keyword value, such as `DataSource`, that maps to the DataSource property, see the documentation for the underlying data provider.
trans-unit.target: Para o valor de palavra-chave específica, tal como `DataSource`, que mapeia para a propriedade de origem de dados, consulte a documentação para o fornecedor de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] equivalent keywords, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] equivalentes palavras-chave, consulte a documentação para o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O nome da origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é uma cadeia vazia.

trans-unit.source: The underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: O fornecedor de dados subjacente não é conhecido.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Enlists this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> in the specified transaction.
trans-unit.target: Isto enlists <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> na transação especificada.

trans-unit.source: This method forwards the call to the data source connection to explicitly enlist in the passed <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>.
trans-unit.target: Este método reencaminha a chamada para a ligação da origem de dados para a inscrição explicitamente na transmitido <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>.</xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>

trans-unit.source: The transaction object to enlist into.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de transação para inscrever no.

trans-unit.source: The state of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O estado do <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> não é <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> is automatically created when the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> class is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>é criado automaticamente quando o <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>classe é criada.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>

trans-unit.source: The creation process might throw metadata-specific exceptions.
trans-unit.target: O processo de criação poderá gerar exceções específicas de metadados.

trans-unit.source: Metadata is loaded into memory and an Entity Data Model (EDM) application uses that metadata to access information about the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Metadados que é carregado na memória e uma aplicação de modelo de dados de entidade (EDM) utiliza esses metadados para aceder às informações sobre a origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ADO.NET Metadata](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [ADO.NET metadados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/196097a5-a791-4ac4-9e6a-805685d481d5).

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar inadvertidamente colocar objetos, tais como <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>sincronizados com os seus metadados <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>tem de bloquear os seus metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação são permitidas depois dos metadados está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se dois cenários em que está bloqueado metadados: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através do construtor predefinido ou através de <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>construtor, que aceita uma cadeia de ligação.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string may be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: Em ambos os casos a cadeia de ligação pode ser alterada várias vezes antes da ligação está aberta.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>bloqueia os metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A></xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através de do <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>construtor, que aceita um <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, os metadados está bloqueado durante a construção.

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação nunca são permitidas.

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: Quando os metadados estiver carregado, o <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>verifica se o modelo conceptual, o modelo de armazenamento e o ficheiro de mapeamento estão todos presentes.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The inline connection string contains an invalid <xref uid="langword_csharp_Metadata" name="Metadata" href=""></xref> keyword value.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ligação inline contém um inválido <xref uid="langword_csharp_Metadata" name="Metadata" href=""> </xref> valor de palavra-chave.

trans-unit.source: Establishes a connection to the data source by calling the underlying data provider's<xref uid="langword_csharp_ Open" name=" Open" href=""></xref> method.
trans-unit.target: Estabelece uma ligação à origem de dados, chamando do fornecedor de dados subjacente<xref uid="langword_csharp_ Open" name=" Open" href=""> </xref> método.

trans-unit.source: To avoid inadvertently putting objects such as <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> out of sync with their metadata, <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> must lock its metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar inadvertidamente colocar objetos, tais como <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>e <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>sincronizados com os seus metadados <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>tem de bloquear os seus metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees>

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are allowed after the metadata is locked.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação são permitidas depois dos metadados está bloqueado.

trans-unit.source: The following are two scenarios in which metadata is locked: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the default constructor, or through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, which accepts a connection string.
trans-unit.target: Seguem-se dois cenários em que está bloqueado metadados: - <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através do construtor predefinido ou através de <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29>construtor, que aceita uma cadeia de ligação.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.String%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In either case the connection string might be changed multiple times before the connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: Em ambos os casos a cadeia de ligação poderá ter sido alterada várias vezes antes da ligação está aberta.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A> or <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> locks the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A>bloqueia os metadados.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.GetMetadataWorkspace%2A> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> instance is constructed through the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> constructor, which that accepts a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> and a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>instância é construída através de <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29>construtor, o qual que aceita um <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace>e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> </xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.%23ctor%28System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace%2CSystem.Data.Common.DbConnection%29> </xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: In this case the metadata is locked at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, os metadados está bloqueado durante a construção.

trans-unit.source: No changes to the connection string are ever allowed.
trans-unit.target: Sem alterações à cadeia de ligação nunca são permitidas.

trans-unit.source: When metadata is loaded, the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> verifies that the conceptual model, the storage model, and the mapping file are all present.
trans-unit.target: Quando os metadados estiver carregado, o <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>verifica se o modelo conceptual, o modelo de armazenamento e o ficheiro de mapeamento estão todos presentes.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when you open the connection, or the name of the underlying data provider is not known.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre um erro ao abrir a ligação ou o nome do fornecedor de dados subjacente não é conhecido.

trans-unit.source: The inline connection string contains an invalid <xref uid="langword_csharp_Metadata" name="Metadata" href=""></xref> keyword value.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de ligação inline contém um inválido <xref uid="langword_csharp_Metadata" name="Metadata" href=""> </xref> valor de palavra-chave.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the version of the data source to which the client is connected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que contém a versão da origem de dados à qual o cliente está ligado.

trans-unit.source: The version of the data source that is contained in the provider connection string.
trans-unit.target: A versão da origem de dados que está contida na cadeia de ligação de fornecedor.

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: A ligação está fechada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref> property of the underlying provider if the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> is open.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref> propriedade do fornecedor subjacente se o <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> está aberta.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, returns <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, devolve <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>, if and only if both the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>’s internal state and the underlying provider's <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref> are open.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>, se e apenas se ambos os <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>do estado interno e o fornecedor subjacente <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref> estão abertas.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref>’s state is open but the provider's <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref> is closed, this property returns <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref>do estado está aberto, mas o fornecedor <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref> estiver fechado, esta propriedade devolve <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, devolve <xref href="System.Data.ConnectionState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the underlying data source connection that is used by the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso para a ligação de origem de dados subjacente, que é utilizado pelo <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> object is closed, the returned data source connection will be closed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>objeto está fechado, a ligação da origem de dados devolvidos será fechada.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>

trans-unit.source: If it is open, an open data source connection will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver aberto, será devolvida uma ligação de origem de dados aberto.

trans-unit.source: If the data source connection information was set, the returned value is always non-null.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações de ligação da origem de dados foi definidas, o valor devolvido é sempre não nulo.

trans-unit.source: If there is no data source connection information (for example, if the default constructor was used and no connection string was set afterwards), then a null reference is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma informações de ligação da origem de dados (por exemplo, se utilizou o construtor predefinido e não foi definida nenhuma cadeia de ligação posteriormente), em seguida, é devolvida uma referência nula.

trans-unit.source: The same data source connection used by the Entity Framework can be shared with other parts of an application.
trans-unit.target: A mesma ligação de origem de dados utilizada pelo Entity Framework pode ser partilhada com outras partes de uma aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The data source connection is returned as a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection> object from the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Connection%2A> property of <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>, or from the StoreConnection property of <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>.
trans-unit.target: A ligação da origem de dados é devolvida como uma <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>de objeto do <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Connection%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>, ou da propriedade StoreConnection de <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>.</xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> </xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext.Connection%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"></xref> for the data source connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> </xref> para a ligação de origem de dados.
